name: Slimb Climb
description:
Ever wonder how hard a slime has to jump to get to the big wide world? Well, now you can experience it! This little slime is no stranger to adventure, help them reach their goal and find new horizons!

The very earth beneath you has erupted with magma from the earths core, leaving you with only one choice TO CLIMB!  

leap from platform to platform, collecting coins and power ups while trying to stay alive.  

This project is a work in progress
